word_mean_info__list.difference: 表一种必然的可能性，也可表示信心或不轻信。强调主观判断。
指自然而然，毫无造作或天生如此。
指毫无疑问，自然如此。可与certainly和naturally换用。

bilingual.source: Certainly, I will help you with your project.

bilingual.source: Certainly, this is the best solution to the problem.

bilingual.source: Certainly, we should consider all possible options before deciding.

list.abstract: certainly ，副词，英音：['sə:tənli] 美音：['sɝtənlɪ]，意为无疑地，必定地。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't you going to say you're sorry? Certainly not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要道歉吗？当然不会。

yingyinNormal.en: But change is a part of life. It certainly is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但变化本就是人生的一部分。当然是。

yingyinNormal.en: Do we know? We certainly do. It's going to be a...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们知道那个？是的，当然知道了，它是个…

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, no one's been happy about this, certainly not the farmers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，没人希望看到那种情况，尤其是农民们。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, that is incredible. From your vantage point, it certainly must seem so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，太厉害了。对你来说，当然是厉害。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's certainly not amnesty no matter how often the critics say it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它当然不是大赦，不管批评者们多么频繁地指出这一点儿。

yingyinNormal.en: We can pitch in. Well, whatever you could spare would certainly be welcome.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能出点。不管你们能拿出多少我们当然都欢迎。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to try out you new carwash. Certainly. It's run by a computer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想试试你的新的洗车设备。当然可以了，这个是由电脑控制的。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Steve. I'm willing to take the risk. And, this certainly qualifies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看，史蒂夫，我可以冒一些险，当然这是取得回报的代价。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like a boat, please. Certainly, I have canoes, sailing boats or pedalos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想租一条船，谢谢。当然可以，我有独木舟，帆船和脚踏船。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, certainly, I'll be over right away. Bye. I think this is a job for Betsy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，当然可以。我现在马上就过来。再见。我的割草宝是时候出动了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's begin the tour. Mr. Rabbit, can we start at your desk? We certainly can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我们开始参观了。兔先生能从你的办公桌先开始吗？那当然可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's begin the tour. Mr. Rabbit, can we start at your desk? We certainly can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我们开始参观了。兔先生能从你的办公桌先开始吗？那当然可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: We certainly have. And this is our next moment. I'll telephone and make an appointment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是当然，这会是我们下一个共同经历，我会打电话预约的。

yingyinNormal.en: Give us a moment. Alone. Certainly. Why? Because I want to speak to Mr. Gardner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们聊会，单独聊。当然可以，但为什么呢？因为我想跟加德纳先生聊聊。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not understand you, my dear. Are you saying Dr Clarkson is a bad doctor? Certainly not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真不理解你，亲爱的，你觉得克拉克森医生不称职吗？当然不会。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's certainly a thought-provoking hypothesis. May I suggest it as the topic for your essay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那当然是一个发人深思的假设，我看你论文写这题目好了？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't deserve such attention. You certainly do. You've completely saved our bacon. Literally!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不配享受如此待遇。当然配，你可救了我们的培根[小命]啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Certainly. It's not like I have to moderate my food intake because I'm planning on eating again very shortly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我又没有因为很快要吃第二餐而故意限制食物摄入量。

yingyinNormal.en: Here are Emily Elephant and her family. Hello Miss Rabbit, we'd like a canoe please. Certainly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是大象艾米丽和她的家人。你好，兔小姐，我们要租一个独木舟。当然可以！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Certainly</highlight>, it's incredibly hard to maintain patience at all times with your children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，始终对孩子保持耐心是非常困难的。

examination_example.sentence: But they <highlight>certainly</highlight> will reshape it, and all the more so the longer they extend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是他们肯定会重塑它，而且从长远看影响范围会更广。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Certainly</highlight>, there are valid concerns about the patchwork regulations that could result if every state sets its own rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，人们有理由担心，如果每个州都制定自己的规则，可能会产生拼凑的法规。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage: certainly在句中的位置：如果有助动词(be, do, have等)，一般放于助动词之后。如果表示否定，一般放于助动词之前。也可位于句首或句末,表示强调。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调<highlight>有把握</highlight>, 深信不疑。
指自然而然, 毫无造作或天生如此。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Marketing professors call it the decoy effect, which is <highlight>certainly</highlight> easier to remember.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 营销学教授称之为诱饵效应，这肯定更容易记住。

examination_example.sentence: With Silicon Valley in its backyard, it <highlight>certainly</highlight> has the chance do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有硅谷在它的后院，它当然有机会做到这一点。

examination_example.sentence: "It's <highlight>certainly</highlight> new territory, especially as home security cameras become easier to install, " says Lizzie Post, president of the Emily Post Institute, America's foremost manners advisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国最杰出的礼仪顾问 Emily Post Institute 的主席 Lizzie Post 说：“这肯定是一个新的领域，尤其是在家庭安全摄像头变得更容易安装的情况下。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: it seems that global collapse is certain to happen in some form, possibly within a decade, <highlight>certainly</highlight> within this century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球崩溃似乎肯定会以某种形式发生，可能在10年内，肯定在本世纪内。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>certainly</highlight> could enjoy the exercise, but I've agreed to go with Alice to buy some clothes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我当然可以享受这种锻炼，但是我已经同意和爱丽丝一起去买衣服了。

examination_example.sentence: The lessons they learned are <highlight>certainly</highlight> more personal and meaningful, because they had to work them out on their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们学到的东西肯定更个性化，更有意义，因为他们必须自己解决这些问题。

examination_example.sentence: Pruitt is <highlight>certainly</highlight> providing a service, but it's not just the bikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Pruitt当然是在提供一种服务，但不仅仅是自行车。

examination_example.sentence: If you can't take their wine away, you should <highlight>certainly</highlight> try to take away their soapbox.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不能拿走他们的酒，你当然要尽力拿走他们的讲台。

examination_example.sentence: Language is <highlight>certainly</highlight> a barrier for many people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言无疑是许多人的障碍。
